1.0.name: wordpress/360imobile-txtimpact-sms-messaging-plug-in
1.0.description: The 360iMobile TXTImpact SMS Notifications & Mass text messaging plugin allows blog's visitors to sign up to receive text message notifications whenever a new post is added. The plug-in integrates with TXTImpact sms marketing platform and allow users to signup to your mobile list via text message using a keyword on a short code. You can also send them text messages from admin panel whenever you like.
